name: VeeBee
description:
Made for the Restricted Resources game jam by Radiobush and Bucket-Full-Games.

Theme:

VB (You can only use the V and B keys to play the game)

This is a game where you play multiple games at once, each being assigned to either the V or B keys.

Time your button inputs right when the blocks line up with the indicated zone to increase your score! Each key is mapped to a specific game (V being the orange game and B being the blue)!

As your score gets higher, the tougher the game become! With multiple visual effects occurring to make it all the more difficult! See what the highest score you can get it!
